active.description: A Boolean value indicating whether the User is active.

addresses.description: A physical mailing address for this User. Canonical type values of 'work', 'home', and 'other'. This attribute is a complex type with the following sub-attributes.

country.description: A two-letter country code defined in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2

formatted.description: The full mailing address, formatted for display or use with a mailing label. This attribute MAY contain  newlines.

id.description: Unique identifier for the User's physical addresses.

postalCode.description: The zip code or postal code.

streetAddress.description: The full street address component, which may include house number, street name, P.O. box, and multi-line extended street address information.  This attribute MAY contain newlines.

type.description: A label indicating the function of the address, e.g., 'work' or 'home'.

dateOfBirth.description: The user's date of birth , in YYYY-MM-DD format

displayName.description: The name of the User, suitable for display  to end-users.  The name SHOULD be the full name of the User being  described, if known.

emails.description: Email addresses for the user. The value SHOULD be canonicalized by the service provider, e.g., 'bjensen@example.com' instead of 'bjensen@EXAMPLE.COM'. Canonical type values of 'work', 'home', and 'other'.

dateAdded.description: The date and time the email was added to the user's profile.

dateVerified.description: The date and time the email was verified

primary.description: A Boolean value indicating the 'primary' or preferred attribute value for this attribute, e.g., the preferred mailing address or primary email address.  The primary attribute value 'true' MUST appear no more than once.

type.description: A label indicating the attribute's function, e.g., 'Work' or 'Home'.

verified.description: flag to note which email has been verified by the user.

emergencyContacts.description: Emergency Contact information for the User.

country.description: A two-letter country code defined in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2

formatted.description: The full mailing address, formatted for display or use with a mailing label. This attribute MAY contain  newlines.

postalCode.description: The zip code or postal code.

streetAddress.description: The full street address component, which may include house number, street name, P.O. box, and multi-line extended street address information.  This attribute MAY contain newlines.

externalClient.description: The provisioning Client that generates the externalId

externalId.description: User identifilier from the provisioning client

id.description: Unique identifier for the user - a uuid

localeOverrides.description: Support for users who want to override locale settings

preference24Hour.description: preferred 24 hour format for the user

preferenceCurrencySymbolLocation.description: preferred currency symbol location for the user

preferenceDateFormat.description: preferred date format for the user

preferenceDefaultCalView.description: preferred default calendar view for the user

preferenceEndDayViewHour.description: preferred hour setting for the end of day, 0-23

preferenceFirstDayOfWeek.description: preferred first day of the week for the user

preferenceHourMinuteSeparator.description: preferred separator between hour and minute

preferenceNegativeCurrencyFormat.description: preferred negative currency format for the user

preferenceNegativeNumberFormat.description: preferred negative number format for the user

preferenceNumberFormat.description: preferred number format for the user

preferenceStartDayViewHour.description: preferred start of day for the user, from 1

familyName.description: The family name of the User, or last name in most Western languages (e.g., 'Jensen' given the full name 'Ms. Barbara J Jensen, III').

formatted.description: The full name, including all middle names, title, and suffixes as appropriate, formatted for display (e.g., 'Ms. Barbara J Jensen, III').

givenName.description: The given name of the User, or first name in most Western languages (e.g., 'Barbara' given the full name 'Ms. Barbara J Jensen, III').

hasNoMiddleName.description: A boolean indicating that the user does not have a middle name

honorificPrefix.description: The honorific prefix(es) of the User, or title in most Western languages (e.g., 'Ms.' given the full name 'Ms. Barbara J Jensen, III').

honorificSuffix.description: The honorific suffix(es) of the User, or  suffix in most Western languages (e.g., 'III' given the full name  'Ms. Barbara J Jensen, III').

legalName.description: The legal name of the User (e.g., 'Jane' given the full name 'Ms. Barbara J Jensen, III').

middleInitial.description: middle initial, if the user has a middle name

middleName.description: The middle name(s) of the User (e.g., 'Jane' given the full name 'Ms. Barbara J Jensen, III').

nickName.description: The casual way to address the user in real  life, e.g., 'Bob' or 'Bobby' instead of 'Robert'.  This attribute  SHOULD NOT be used to represent a User's username (e.g., 'bjensen' or  'mpepperidge').

phoneNumbers.description: Phone numbers for the User.  The value SHOULD be canonicalized by the service provider according to the format specified in RFC 3966, e.g., 'tel:+1-201-555-0123'. Canonical type values of 'work', 'home', 'mobile', 'fax', 'pager', and 'other'.

countryCode.description: A two-letter code defined in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 denoting the country the phone number was issued in. e.g., US

display.description: A human-readable phone number for display

operatingSystem.description: The OS of the  device, when the phone is a cellphone type

type.description: A label indicating the attribute's function, e.g., 'Work', 'Home'.

preferredLanguage.description: Indicates the User's preferred written or spoken language.  Generally used for selecting a localized user interface

timezone.description: The User's time zone in the 'Olson' time zone database format, e.g., 'America/Los_Angeles'.

isDoNotTouch.description: Whether we should delete user record or not, according to the user's data retention policies.

policyIds.description: User's active data retention policy Ids.

employeeNumber.description: Client supplied employee's number within the company, unique for the company

entitlements.description: The features enabled for the user

jobTitle.description: user's job title in the company

$ref.description: The URI of the SCIM resource representing the referenced user.

employeeNumber.description: The referenced user's employee number, if it is an Enterprise user

$ref.description: The URI of the SCIM resource representing the referenced user.

employeeNumber.description: The referenced user's employee number, if it is an Enterprise user

terminationDate.description: Termination Date, in YYYY-MM-DD format, if the employee is terminated, this can also be used to calculate the data retention period

enableExpenseAssistant.description: How trip report should be created by Expense Assistant

guuid.description: OUM.guuid for this CTE.Expense user. Not set if this is not a CTE expense user

outtaskCompanyId.description: outtask_company.id for this CTE user. Not set if this is not a CTE user

outtaskUserId.description: outtask_user.user_id. Not set if this is not a CTE user

locateRoles.description: external facing roles for the User for Locate

expense.description: Any private info expense wants to store

expenseIt.description: Any private info ExpenseIt wants to store

locate.description: Any private info Locate wants to store

notifications.description: Any private info Notifications Platform wants to store

travel.description: Any private info travel wants to store

userName.description: The name that can be used to login to CTE

active.description: A Boolean value indicating whether the company is active.

addresses.description: A physical mailing address for this company.

country.description: A two-letter country code defined in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2

formatted.description: The full mailing address, formatted for display or use with a mailing label. This attribute MAY contain  newlines.

postalCode.description: The zip code or postal code.

streetAddress.description: The full street address component, which may include house number, street name, P.O. box, and multi-line extended street address information.  This attribute MAY contain newlines.

country.description: A two-letter country code defined in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2

formatted.description: The full mailing address, formatted for display or use with a mailing label. This attribute MAY contain  newlines.

postalCode.description: The zip code or postal code.

streetAddress.description: The full street address component, which may include house number, street name, P.O. box, and multi-line extended street address information.  This attribute MAY contain newlines.

id.description: Unique identifier for the data retention policy

name.description: Name of the company data retention policy

unit.description: Period of the data retention policy

value.description: Period of the data retention policy

defaultLanguage.description: Indicates the default language for the company.

entitlements.description: The features enabled for the company

id.description: Unique identifier for the company - a uuid

loginOneTimeLinkExpirationLength.description: Login One Time Link Expiration Length

mobileRequiresNonalphanum.description: Require None alpha numberic for Mobile

numGenerationsBeforeCanReuse.description: Number of Generations Before the password can be reused

numSecurityQuestionsUsersPick.description: Number of security questions users can pick

passwordResetEmailPolicy.description: When should password reset password email shall be sent

passwordResetSupportEmail.description: The FROM address of the password or PIN reset email

restrictPasswordResetOncePerDay.description: restrict Password Reset Once Per Day

isHighSecurityAccount.description: Whether the company is a high security account

status.description: same as HTTP status code, e.g. 400, 401, etc.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: companyId that the user belongs to (used along with employeeNumber)

parameters.name: patch operations
parameters.description: patch operations to apply on the user identity
company's outtaskCompanyId (one of outtaskCompanyId or entityId must be specified)
parameters.name: outtaskCompanyId

parameters.description: company's entityId (one of outtaskCompanyId or entityId must be specified)
parameters.name: entityId
